void PyTintShaderPSA::fogAmount ( float  f  ) 

This is the python Set-Accessor for the fogAmount attribute of TintShaderPSA.

This sets the amount of fog colour to blend in with the animated colour.

Parameters:
fogAmount The new amount of fog to blend into the colour.

float PyTintShaderPSA::fogAmount ( void   )  const

This is the python Get-Accessor for the fog attribute of TintShaderPSA.

It returns the amount of the fog colour that is blended in with the animated colour.

Returns:
The amount of fog that is blended in with the colour.

void PyTintShaderPSA::period ( float  p  ) 

This is the python Set-Accessor for the period attribute of TintShaderPSA.

Parameters:
period The new period for the keyframe colour animation.

float PyTintShaderPSA::period ( void   )  const

This is the python Get-Accessor for the period attribute of TintShaderPSA.

It returns the time, in seconds, of the period of the keyframe colour animation.

Returns:
The period of the keyframe colour animation.

PyObject * PyTintShaderPSA::py_addTintAt ( PyObject *  args  ) 

This Python method allows the script to add a tint at a particular age for the particles.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. This should be a float (time/age in seconds) followed by a four-tuple of floats (RGB-Alpha values.)

PyObject * PyTintShaderPSA::py_clearAllTints ( PyObject *  args  ) 

This Python method allows the script to clear all tints added to the TintShader action.

Parameters:
args The list of parameters passed from Python. All arguments are ignored in this method.

void PyTintShaderPSA::repeat ( bool  flag  ) 

This is the python Set-Accessor for the repeat attribute of TintShaderPSA.

Parameters:
flag The new value for the flag.

bool PyTintShaderPSA::repeat ( void   )  const

This is the python Get-Accessor for the repeat attribute of TintShaderPSA.

If this flag is true, the age of the particle will be in modular total time of the tint sequence.

Returns:
The repeat flag's current value.
